title: Video: Tobias Jesso Jr. – Without You / Just A Dream
content:
Tobias Jesso Jr.

swung by a dive bar in LA to perform a couple of songs for La Blogotheque, and boy are they beautiful. Including a previously unheard new track, Without You, and ‘oldie’ Just A Dream, it’s a stunning indication of what’s to come from his debut LP, expected 2015 on True Panther. There are few artists around at this moment in time who are capable of harnessing such open, honest expressionism as he is, and it’s undoubtedly something that shines through on this session.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
